title: High ping
body: My ping is really high while playing, it happened today. Some games the ping stays at 60 and other games the ping stays at 200 for the whole game. Don't know what is causing this issue but i can talk in skype, watch youtube and twitch streams without any internet problem. Any ideas?

replies.body: It sounds like you might be having a network issue like packet loss that is causing you to have some input delays.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) to get an overview of what exactly is going wrong.  The results will also provide a list of troubleshooting steps to get your squared away.  That should help!
